trans-unit.source: The source of the event, typically an application settings wrapper class derived from the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 事件的來源，通常為衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase" /> 類別的應用程式設定包裝函式類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs" /> containing the data for the event.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> event occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed, typically through a call to the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging>應用程式設定屬性的值變更之前，通常透過呼叫，就會發生事件<xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> can be canceled through the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs> event data class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> 您可以透過取消<xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs>事件資料類別。
